text.text: The last and most unique of the new biomes introduced with the Lost Worlds mod is the Redwoods Forest, or as you may reconise as a Sequoia Forest. It's a dense forest biome with massive Sequoia trees mixed with conifer and young sequoia trees. It's the perfect place to get Sequoia wood, with one tree most likly giving you a life-time supply. Is not like the other forest biome, not being a spawning location. However, it would be the perfect place to build a treehouse. Or a dinosaur park.
